headline: Angular Developer.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description:
Thank you for visiting my portfolio! I am currently employed full-time as a middle front-end developer for Redoc.co, but I am always open to new opportunities and challenges.

If you have an exciting project or part-time opportunity related to my field, I would love to hear from you. I am passionate about expanding my skill set and contributing to valuable projects. Feel free to reach out and let's discuss how we can collaborate to create something great together!
contact.address-2: Ninh Kieu District, Can Tho City

value.name: Tran Duc Phuong
value.education: Bachelor of Engineer (Valedictorian) - Can Tho University

angular.description: I have been primarily using Angular as the main frontend framework for both corporate and personal projects. Over the past 1.5 years, it's safe to say that almost every week I have either been coding with Angular or deepening my understanding of it.

subSkills.1: Implementing Basic & Reusable Building Block: Components, Directives, Pipes, etc
subSkills.2: Form Manipulation: Reactive Forms, Template Driven Forms
subSkills.5: Handle HTTP Request (RESTful API) with HttpClient
subSkills.6: Understanding Data Sharing Between Components Using Binding, Service, DI and Store (NgRx)

english.description: For over two years, I have been utilizing English as my primary working language. I am comfortable communicating in English, both in written and spoken form, and I have a good grasp of reading and understanding English documents

agile.description: I have been working in an Agile environment for over two years. I am familiar with the Scrum framework and have been using it in my daily work. I also have a good understanding of Kanban and have used it in some of my projects.

aboutMe:
Hello! I'm Duc Phuong, a Front-End Angular programmer.
With over 2 years of experience as a Front-End Dev, I have been fortunate to work in various professional and dynamic environments in Can Tho and Ho Chi Minh City.
I aspire to contribute to creating valuable products, continuously learning and seeking knowledge from the best. If you are seeking a passionate Front-End programmer committed to adding value to your project, please feel free to contact me. I am eager for the opportunity to collaborate and contribute to our mutual success.

1.description: WIntern and Front-End programmer part-time for a project for a large insurance company, Vietnam branch. The team is responsible for the development and maintenance of the web application using Angular and Nx.

responsibilities.2: Review the design and develop a new feature based on that design
responsibilities.3: Participated in the weekly meeting with the account manager to discuss the issues and propose solutions

achievements.1: Getting acquainted with the work of a web programmer.
achievements.2: Contributing to the team's successful completion of 3 projects, meeting customer requirements on schedule.
achievements.3: Familiarizing myself with Angular framework and various libraries like Bootstrap 4, RxJS, etc.

2.description: One of the primary Front-End programmers involved in various projects for clients from Australia. The team is responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using Angular on the Front-End and Python on the Back-End.

responsibilities.1: Received design from the designer, reviewed, and provided feedback to the designer.
responsibilities.2: Built web applications using Angular based on the design.
responsibilities.3: Handled user interactions and integrated APIs from the Back-End..
responsibilities.4: Maintained and supported multiple projects simultaneously.
responsibilities.5: Participated in daily meetings with the team and project manager to discuss issues and propose solutions.

achievements.1: Getting familiar with Scrum - Kanban methodologies and web application development processes..
achievements.2: Significantly improving communication skills, self-learning abilities, and the capacity to work under pressure.

3.description: One of the primary Front-End programmers for multiple projects with Singaporean clients. The team is responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using Angular on the Front-End and NestJS on the Back-End.

responsibilities.1: Reviewed design, documentation, and technical requirements, providing feedback to designers and BAs if any issues arose.
responsibilities.2: Developed feature modules, handled complex form clusters, and integrated APIs from the Back-End.
responsibilities.3: Wrote reusable directives, pipes, and UI libraries throughout the project..
responsibilities.4: Implemented permission system for around 100 sub-modules in the project.
responsibilities.5: Utilized the Transloco library to implement multilingual functionality for the project.
responsibilities.6: Participated in daily meetings with the team and PM, as well as held separate discussions with BE, BA, QC, and Testers to address issues and propose solutions.

achievements.1: Making significant progress in knowledge and skills related to commonly used technologies, especially Angular and TypeScript
achievements.2: Greatly improving self-learning skills, discipline, and the ability to work under pressure.
achievements.3: Developing a better work vision and future planning, while cultivating a more positive attitude when facing challenging issues.
